title: Glitch ingame
body: When i spawned into a game as warwick, i spawned in mid lane behind the inhibitor turret. My team accused me for hacking but i told them it was a glitch. Can you please resolve this to prevent further misunderstandings and issues? Thank you.

replies.body: Oh snap that sounds awkward to be sure. If it happens again, shoot us some kinda video if possible so we can take a look at what's going on.
